The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:
After a standard system update you need to restart Apache or
php5-fpm to make all the necessary changes.
threat: An attacker could use this flaw to cause a denial of service or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted CDF file.
An attacker could use this flaw to cause a denial of service or possibly execute arbitrary code via crafted DNS records.
